original_title: Dois Córregos - Verdades Submersas no Tempo
overview: Young executive woman returns to small town of Dois Córregos and remembers the time, in the late 1960s, when she met her uncle there, a man who was running away from the military dictatorship ruling Brazil at the time.

production_companies.name: Secretaria Municipal de Cultura de São Paulo

title: Two Streams
